snippet.title: West Wins NBA All-Star Game 152-149, Kevin Durant claims MVP Honors
snippet.description:
West Wins NBA All-Star Game 152-149, Kevin Durant claims MVP Honors (http://www.sportsbetting.ag/news/nba-basketball/27/02/2012/west-wins-nba-all-star-game-152-149-kevin-durant-claims-mvp-honors/)
1 point
by rosedevid
2 years ago
0 comment Follow
Kevin Durant scored 36 points and Kobe Bryant added 27 points Sunday night at Amway Center in Orlando, helping the Western Conference hold back the Eastern Conference with 152-149 victory in the 2012 NBA All-Star Game. This victory was the second straight for the West All-Stars and their third in the last four years.
*[2 years ago]: 2012-02-27T11:05:53.000Z
